question:
A consulting company provides professional services to customers worldwide. The company provides solutions and tools for customers to expedite gathering and analyzing data on AWS. The company needs to centrally manage and deploy a common set of solutions and tools for customers to use for self-service purposes.

Which solution will meet these requirements?

options.A: Create AWS CloudFormation templates for the customers.
options.B: Create AWS Service Catalog products for the customers.
options.C: Create AWS Systems Manager templates for the customers.
options.D: Create AWS Config items for the customers.

explanation: AWS Service Catalog allows organizations to create and manage catalogs of IT services that are approved for use. It provides centralized management of deployed products and enables self-service deployment by customers. CloudFormation templates alone don't provide the management and governance features of Service Catalog.
